data.title: List of television stations in North Carolina
data.text:
This is a list of broadcast television stations serving cities in the state of North Carolina.

VHF stations

Channel 2: WFMY-TV - (CBS) - Greensboro (Winston-Salem/Greensboro)

Channel 2: WUND-TV - (PBS) - Columbia, NC "UNC-TV" (Outer Banks/Norfolk, VA)

Channel 3: WBTV - (CBS) - Charlotte "WBTV 3"

Channel 3: WWAY-TV - (ABC) - Wilmington, NC

Channel 4: WUNC-TV - (PBS) - Chapel Hill, NC "UNC-TV" (flagship) (Raleigh-Durham)

Channel 5: WRAL-TV - (CBS) - Raleigh (Raleigh-Durham)
